Plot: Two death-obsessed sisters, outcasts in their suburban neighborhood, must deal with the tragic consequences when one of them is bitten by a deadly werewolf.
Title: Ginger Snaps
Writer: Karen Walton (story), John Fawcett (story), Karen Walton
Actors: Emily Perkins, Katharine Isabelle, Kris Lemche, Mimi Rogers
tomatoConsensus: The strong female cast and biting satire of teenage life makes Ginger Snaps far more memorable than your average werewolf movie -- or teen flick.
